item.title: Learning How To Make Hugo Posts with Markdown
item.description: Introduction I created this blog to start journaling my programming experiences and keep a record of what I learn along the way. After a few hours of struggling with GitHub Pages and Hugo, this blog successfully went live! That being said, there is still a lot of work to do. The very first thing I need to work on is to learn how to make a post, so that I can write about things I learn in the future.
